languages.text: {n}Ханейманн поднимает на вас взгляд. Его кожа стала желтоватой и липкой от странного, напоминающего смазку пота. Зрачок левого глаза кажется неуловимо странным — присмотревшись, вы видите, что он больше не круглый. Теперь он имеет форму многоугольника с тринадцатью сторонами.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ханейманн поднимает на вас взгляд. Его кожа стала желтоватой и липкой от странного, напоминающего смазку пота. Зрачок левого глаза кажется неуловимо странным — присмотревшись, вы видите, что он больше не круглый. Теперь он имеет форму многоугольника с тринадцатью сторонами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and sticky from the lubricant-like sweat. The pupil of his left eye looks somewhat strange. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a thirteen-sided polygon.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and sticky from the lubricant-like sweat. The pupil of his left eye looks somewhat strange. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a thirteen-sided polygon.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and sticky from the lubricant-like sweat. The pupil of his left eye looks a tad odd. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round—it is a tridecagon.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and sticky from the lubricant-like sweat. The pupil of his left eye looks a tad odd. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round—it is a tridecagon.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

{n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルがあなたを見上げる。肌は潤滑油のような汗で黄色っぽく、ベタベタしている。左目の瞳孔がどことなくおかしい。よく見ると、その形はもはや円形ではなく、13角形になっていることがわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルがあなたを見上げる。肌は潤滑油のような汗で黄色っぽく、ベタベタしている。左目の瞳孔がどことなくおかしい。よく見ると、その形はもはや円形ではなく、13角形になっていることがわかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡抬起头，看着你。他的皮肤满是汗渍，看起来有些发黄，黏糊糊的。他左眼的瞳孔有些古怪，你仔细看了一眼，发现瞳孔已经不再是圆形，而是变成了三角型。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡抬起头，看着你。他的皮肤满是汗渍，看起来有些发黄，黏糊糊的。他左眼的瞳孔有些古怪，你仔细看了一眼，发现瞳孔已经不再是圆形，而是变成了三角型。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te mira. Su piel se ha vuelto amarillenta y pegajosa por el lubricante del sudor y notas algo extraño en la pupila de su ojo izquierdo. La miras más de cerca y te das cuenta de que ya no es redonda: es un tridecágono.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te mira. Su piel se ha vuelto amarillenta y pegajosa por el lubricante del sudor. La pupila de su ojo izquierdo parece un poco extraña. Lo miras más de cerca y te das cuenta de que su forma ya no es redonda: es un tridecágono.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt zu dir auf. Seine Haut hat sich gelblich verfärbt und glänzt unter dem schmierigen Schweiß. Irgendetwas ist seltsam an der Pupille seines linken Auges. Du siehst genauer hin und erkennst, dass sie nicht mehr rund ist ... sondern ein Tridekagon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt zu dir auf. Seine Haut hat einen gelblichen Ton angenommen und ist klebrig von seinem schmiermittel-artigen Schweiß. Die Pupille seines linken Auges sieht etwas merkwürdig aus. Du siehst genauer hin und erkennst, dass sie nicht länger rund ist, sondern ein Tridekagon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lève les yeux vers vous. En plus d'être rendue collante par sa transpiration semblable à du lubrifiant, sa peau a viré au jaunâtre. Vous remarquez également que la pupille de son œil gauche n'est plus ronde, mais tridécagonale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lève les yeux vers vous. En plus d'être rendue collante par sa transpiration semblable à du lubrifiant, sa peau a viré au jaunâtre. Vous remarquez également que la pupille de son œil gauche n'est plus ronde, mais tridécagonale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Makine yağını andıran teri yüzünden cildi sararıp yapış yapış olmuş, sol göz bebeğinde ise bir tuhaflık var. Yakından bakınca göz bebeğinin artık yuvarlak değil de onüçgen şeklinde olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks up at you. His skin has gone yellowish and clammy from the lubricant-like sweat, and there is something strange about the pupil of his left eye. You look closer and realise that its shape is no longer round — it is a tridecagon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Makine yağını andıran teri yüzünden cildi sararıp yapış yapış olmuş, sol göz bebeğininse tuhaf bir yanı var. Yakından bakınca göz bebeğinin artık yuvarlak değil de onüçgen şeklinde olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
